last_episode_to_air.name: All the Money in the World
last_episode_to_air.overview: With one betrayal, the dominoes start to fall for the thieves as investigators capture those responsible for the heist.

name: The Great Heist
overview: Based on the 1994 robbery of US$33 million from Colombia's central bank, which turned the country upside down.

episodes.name: The Big One
episodes.overview: Professional thief and con man Chayo is struggling financially and must convince an old friend to plan a heist on Colombia's Bank of the Republic.

episodes.name: The Crew
episodes.overview: Chayo and Molina recruit a team while finalizing details for the bank heist, facing multiple challenges that threaten their carefully constructed plan.

episodes.name: Punch
episodes.overview: As the thieves start executing the heist, an unexpected difficulty involving the bank's safe significantly delays their progress and tensions arise.

episodes.name: Escape from Valledupar
episodes.overview: Once the thieves leave the bank, Chayo, Molina and Mrs. K face obstacles in transporting such an enormous amount of money out of the city.

episodes.name: Funny Money
episodes.overview: When the Bank of the Republic and law enforcement team shows up to throw a wrench in the thieves' plans, everyone involved with the heist is endangered.

episodes.name: All the Money in the World
episodes.overview: With one betrayal, the dominoes start to fall for the thieves as investigators capture those responsible for the heist.
